thread.title: Watch your words, analysts tell North Korea
thread.title_full: Watch your words, analysts tell North Korea

title: Watch your words, analysts tell North Korea
text:
More 
When news broke out that a North Korean man was murdered at Kuala Lumpur International Airport 2 (KLIA2), the public was intrigued as to the motives behind the attack. 
Even after it was confirmed by Malaysian authorities that the man was indeed Kim Jong-nam, the estranged half-brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, foreign relations analysts believed that the incident would have little, if any effect on the countryâ€™s diplomatic ties with North Korea. 
Since then, however, the North Korean envoy to Malaysia and Wisma Putra have been trading barbs over the matter.
